title: Flom Says Economics at the Root of Racism
itunes:title: Flom Says Economics at the Root of Racism
description:
Jason Flom, CEO of Lava Records and Founding Board Member of the Innocence Project, discusses how over-policing is takes money needed for education and community programs. He also explains how the prison system has contributed to institutional racism in the country.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
